title: What are the arguments against pragmatism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pragmatism as practical…as logical…as utilitarian and the most reasoned out perspective and useful action…hinges on what you see success as being. What is the goal being worked for? - Ultimately, the greatest good for the most people is hard to argue against…unless your imperfections and failure to live up to the common expectation designates you as disposable and worthy of sacrifice so those who deserve to live have more space, and things to do it with…as you will no longer have any use for them. Kindness is often impractical. Empathy sucks and slows us way down. Sparing feelings just furthers delusions and love abandons our own responsibility to survive, if dying would help the one we put above our self… Pragmatism is pure mind that has the heart in chains. It might make everything better, but caring ruins it again.

The most controversial heads on collision of pro and anti pragmatism advocates in this era are about euthanasia ,death penalty, divorce, abortion. Both sides have best arguments but unfortunately, having the center agreement point is close to impossibility. The minds against pragmatism are commonly the conservative ones and they stick firm in these factors : religion based beliefs , concepts, teachings, especially about the sacredness of life from conception to the natural’flat line’, ,,,, economic considerations ; beliefs that the more the merrier or large population is economically advantageous,,,,, customs and traditions, and,,, everything about perception of better morality. We may browse pragmatism for more details. Thanx,
